snippet: The United States Department of Energy agreed to improve the transportation and handling of nuclear waste stored in Carlsbad, where a leak exposed 17 employees to radiation in February 2014.
abstract: Agreement between Energy Dept and New Mexico will allow Waste Isolation Pilot Plant in Carlsbad to reopen; nuclear waste storage facility has been closed since early 2014 following radiation leak.
lead_paragraph: The United States Department of Energy agreed to improve the transportation and handling of nuclear waste stored in Carlsbad, where a leak exposed 17 employees to radiation in February 2014.

headline.main: New Mexico: Deal Is Reached to Reopen Nuclear Waste Plant
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Deal Is Reached to Reopen Nuclear Waste Plant
